QuestData.Title: Mists' Opportunity
QuestData.Description: Now is the time to strike.$b$bGolgoss, Arconiss, and I will go east, into Jahesh's domain. Meet us there, and prepare for battle.$b$bToday, we restore the pride of our people.
QuestData.RewardText: My name will be forgotten, but my actions will not.$b$bNor will yours, $n.
